channel.title: Ambient Occlusion in L4D 2
channel.description:
How can i get my ambient occlusion to look better, it doesn't seem to be working right.
[img]https://img181.imageshack.us/img181/6028/l4dsvwhitesand0002.jpg[/img]
Intel core I7 920 @ 3.02 Ghz EVGA X58 motherboard EVGA GTX 285 2GB 12 GB Corsair Dominator DDR3 2x 750GB WD 7,200 RPM drives in RAID0 1200w PSU
EDIT: after searching, all i could find was that it is interfering with smoke particles and the only choice is to turn it off in the Nvidia control panel. :frowning:
